attributes.action: Stop the Closure of Plasnewydd Community Centre, Cardiff
attributes.additional_details:
Plasnewydd Community Centre, Shakespeare St, Roath, Cardiff.  "A friendly community centre right in the heart of Plasnewydd, We have a diverse range of classes and activities to suit everyone".
 This is the description on the Cardiff  Council Website.   This is ALSO, the only Community Centre in Roath and is the popular venue for many sporting/social/leisure activities.  It serves hundreds of children and adults on a regular basis, with after school activities,   promoting healthy and active interests.  Without this Centre, many children and adults will have nowhere to gather.  Please sign the petition to KEEP THIS CENTRE OPEN.... Thank you

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter, and as such the Wales Office cannot intervene.
